data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''=''' allows you to swap the keys associated with your '''i'''tems, '''s'''pells, and '''a'''bilities. This allows you to easily assign commonly used weapons to the '''a''' and '''b''' slots for quick-swapping with ' (apostrophe), and can be used to hide spells you don't want to accidentally cast in keys you are unlikely to push.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''=''' represents a piece of [[jewellery]].
